quotes.quote: When a man gives his opinion, he's a man. When a woman gives her opinion, she's a bitch.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: I'm tough, I'm ambitious, and I know exactly what I want. If that makes me a bitch, okay.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: I hate to hear you talk about all women as if they were fine ladies instead of rational creatures. None of us want to be in calm waters all our lives.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle.
quotes.author: Irina Dunn

quotes.quote: Men are afraid that women will laugh at them. Women are afraid that men will kill them.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: I myself have never been able to find out precisely what feminism is: I only know that people call me a feminist whenever I express sentiments that differentiate me from a doormat.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: As long as she thinks of a man, nobody objects to a woman thinking.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: I know enough to know that no woman should ever marry a man who hated his mother.
quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: No woman gets an orgasm from shining the kitchen floor.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: A feminist is anyone who recognizes the equality and full humanity of women and men.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Women have served all these centuries as looking glasses possessing the magic and delicious power of reflecting the figure of man at twice its natural size.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir
